translations.translation: Give them the news of a painful punishment -
So give them news of painful punishment,
So give them the good news of a painful chastisement,
(Muhammad), tell them that they will all suffer a painful torment
Therefore give them the glad tidings of a painful punishment.
So, announce to them a painful torment.
So announce to them a painful punishment~
So give them good tidings of a painful chastisement,
So give them tidings of a painful doom,
Therefore, give them the news of a painful punishment.
Wherefore announce thou Unto them a torment afflictive.
So inform them of a painful punishment,
So announce to them a Penalty Grievous,
So announce to them a painful torment.
Therefore give to them glad tidings of a painful punishment,
So inform them of a painful punishment.
So give them tidings of a painful punishment,
[84:24] So give them good tidings, inform them, of a painful chastisement,
(So give them) so give, Muhammad, to those who disbelieve in Allah (tidings of a painful doom) whose pain will extend to their hearts on the Day of Badr as well as in the Hereafter,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبالجملة: { فَبَشِّرْهُمْ } يا أكمل الرسل بشارة على سبيل التهكم والاستهزاء { بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ } [الانشقاق: 24] نازل عليهم حين أُخذوا بعصيانهم وآثامهمه
